buttons.3: - Buttons do not respond when pressed
buttons.5: - Bouncing or skipping cursor while scrolling
buttons.all: - Buttons double clicking</br>- Buttons spamming</br>- Buttons do not respond when pressed</br>- Buttons releasing while pressed</br>- Bouncing or skipping cursor while scrolling

connection.2: - Mouse does not work or is not detected
connection.all: - Disconnection issues</br>- Mouse does not work or is not detected</br>- Connection drops randomly</br>- Random freezing issues</br>- Mouse cannot pair

power.all: - Mouse does not charge</br>- Battery drains fast</br>- Poor battery life</br>- Stuck at X% while charging</br>- Mouse won't power on

tracking.3: - Cursor does not move but buttons are working
tracking.all: - Erratic Cursor Movement</br>- Cursor is jumping or skipping</br>- Cursor does not move but buttons are working</br>- Cursor keeps disappearing
